name: Iron Teeth Of Baba Yaga, The

action.name: Pinch
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (3d4 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: Iron's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verball components:
At will: detect magic, mending, ray of frost, true strike
4/day each: acid arrow, blur, heat metal

spells: detect magic, mending, ray of frost, true strike, grease, magic missile, shield, acid arrow, blur, heat metal
